reviews.text: Hotel is located in a local neighborhood, away from all the tourists. When you arrive at the hotel, you must ring for entry. Once registered your room key will also act as the front door key. The staff was friendly upon check-in was happy to answer questions. My room was small, the décor was in knotty pine. One single bed, the mattress was not very comfortable and only light curtains which in the morning did not keep the sun out, so bring a sleeping mask with you. The room had a small TV with some English speaking channels, also free wifi, and a very clean bathroom, shower only. There is also a safe in the room. The breakfast room was very nice, it was quite large, with comfortable seating and a nice selection of foods, breakfast was included in the room rate.
reviews.title: Nice hotel in local neighborhood

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Getting to and from the main tourist attractions is easy, a bus stop in front of the hotel or the U bahn about two blocks away. All in all, a nice hotel, which made for a pleasant stay.
reviews.title: Spacious room, good breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for two nights. Location is perhaps not within walking distance from Vienna old town / city centre, but there are trams and metro stations just couple of minutes by walking from the hotel.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.text: Our room was very clean, very spacious and even it was winter; it was very warm. We had a fridge and a nice big bath tub to warm ourselves after cold day outside.
reviews.title: Guys are tired of tourist

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent and staff was very helpful.
reviews.title: Something different!

reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel with my falimly (2 adults and 2 chd). The front desk staff is very nice and helpful, with a lot of explanations about how to get the best of your Vienna sightseeing. We arrived late at night, they waited for us, although we hadnt a credit card confirmation. On our arrival around midnight
reviews.title: great value for money

reviews.text: we were given beers and orange juice for the kids. They have an excellent garage for car for a reasonable price. The metro station is only 300 met.away. The morning breakfast buffet is great. Room nice and clean. What else for less than 100 eur for a family of four?
reviews.title: Good hotel for the price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This modern hotel is an excellent value. The room and bathroom were spotlessly clean and a decent size. The location is just slightly removed from the city center, but the subway station is close and the ride to the center is just two or three stops. The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was fine. Recommended.
reviews.title: Pleasant stay.

reviews.text: We, my wife and I, had a three night stay here. Rooms are clean, modern and comfortable. The breakfast is absolutely great. Much choice and good quality.
reviews.title: got a very uncomfortable couch instead of a bed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location of the hotel is very convenient. You can go into town walking, or take a tram or bus.
reviews.title: Nice hotel in Vienna

reviews.text: We stayed as 3 couples from 21 to 25 Oct. Rooms were warm and comfortable.An electric kettle was something we really missed though. Breakfast was good and plentiful. It was a very short walk from the Metro and very convenient to get to the city centre. THe best aspect was the extremely helpful front office staff : Mathews and Thomas. Both of theme did a lot to explain, guide and book our sightseeing. Good show!!
reviews.title: Comfortable Hotel and Helpful Staff

reviews.text: lovely 3-star hotel,cozy and spacious single room and bathroom,spotlessly clean,good choice for breakfast,friendly staff,very close to keplerplatz subway station.all in all the hotel is a great base to explore Vienna and very affordable too!
reviews.title: Excellent base to explore Vienna!

reviews.text: Very clean hotel, large room ( # 43), large bathroom, safe available in the room, friendly staff, rich breakfast, free map, good value. Reasonable location (3 minutes from UBahn /subway station Keplerplaz and 1 minute from SBahn/ tram 0 station Laxenburger- Gudrun strasse), however felt a little not comfortable at night when we returned to the hotel since the area looked a little sordide at night, though it seemed safe enough. We were two female travellers and we were fine, however for a single female traveller would be reccommendable to return earlier in order to avoid any risks.
reviews.title: excellent choice for couples/ families/ groups.

reviews.text: For my friend and I it was a wonderful vacation in the splendid Vienna and I would definitely stay at Hotel Caroline if I visit Vienna again.
reviews.title: Really nice hotel!!!

reviews.text: Irina ( Romania)
reviews.title: Excellent Value Close to All

reviews.text: I spent one night at the Caroline during my trip to Vienna. The hotel is in a renovated well maintained art-noveau building. The receptionist was very friendly and competent and upon request gave me a quiet room which was simply furnished but immaculately clean. Breakfast was very good,served buffet style, in a large and clean dining hall on the first floor of the hotel. The only drawback of this hotel is its location-the neighborhood is not very attractive but, on the plus side, it is only a few minutes from a subway station, which makes the ride downtown simple and quick. The Caroline is a no-frills place but if you are looking for a super clean and friendly place to stay you will not be disappointed. I would stay at this hotel again.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.text: We recently spent 3 days at the Caroline during a vacation in Vienna. We were traveling with a group and all parties expressed favorable opinions of their stay. Hotel was very clean and the room was big and well kept. Every time we asked for directions they were accurate and recommendations for restaurants were spot on. The only reason this hotel does not get a perfect rating is the noise level. Our room (15) was located on the busy street side of the hotel. It was warm so we opened the windows to cool off the room but the street noise was awful all night long. A bus stop was located directly below our room and on top of that a number of electric trains are parked across the street so we heard activity all night long. We would stay again but request a different room next time.
reviews.title: Good Budget Hotel

reviews.text: Low price but valuable service,although the street that this hotel is located is not very attractive you can reach metro and other public transportation in 5 minutes...also it is near Keplerplatz Street,full of caffee,icecream,foods,etc...you know ,you should try it...
reviews.title: Try Hotel Caroline,it worth that!

reviews.text: Have fun...!
reviews.title: excellent value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The guy managing the hotel was very friendly, approachable and helpful. The hotel was clean and comfortable. The building quite a nice, modern extension internally. Very good continental breakfast with friendly service. Location was good considering how very easy it was to get into the centre by tram; there is also an underground station nearby but this was temporarily closed during my stay. Tram took under 10 mins to the centre and I found the location handy for meidling station. WiFi signal was excellent in my room. Great value for money.
reviews.title: Nice, reasonably priced hotel in Vienna
